changeSet.author: Greg
changeSet.createView: select * from spatial.user_areas as areas LEFT JOIN (select a.user_area_id as id, string_agg(a.scope, '|') as scopes from (select user_area_id, '#'||scope_name||'#' as scope from spatial.user_scope group by scope, user_area_id) as a group by a.user_area_id) as area_scopes ON areas.gid = area_scopes.id
